'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|landmass]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This large channel connects the southwestern islands with [[Neketaka]], passing between various arid, uninhabited islands.

==Locations==
;Sanctum/northern island
Located directly southwest of Neketaka, this otherwise deserted landmass contains:
[[File:Icon Oathbinders Sanctum.png|75px|left]]
:::'''[[Oathbinder's Sanctum]]''': An ancient temple dedicated to [[Woedica]].<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Oasis.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Oasis''': You can also collect water from a filthy oasis...<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Old Battleground.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Old Battleground''': or search a deserted battlefield here.<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Camp.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Call for help''': Appears after collecting an [[Unsigned Missive]].<br clear="left" />

;Southern island
South of the Sanctum island is another large desert region
[[File:Icon Mountain Ridge 2 Cave Left.png|75px|left]]
:::'''[[Cavern of Xaur Tuk-Tuk]]''': Main location in this area, a small cave where you can free [[Mother Sharp-Rock]], and get the shield [[Shimmer Scale]] in the process.<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Cliffs.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Howling Gorge''': The first obstacle in moving inland is the Howling Gorge, full of odd shouts and whistles. You can use Perception 13 or Cipher talents to identify the sounds. Move deeper into the canyon to find out it's a bunch of xaurips with a drake. You can observe a devouring ceremony, then attack.<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Cliffs.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Broken Spear Pass''': The pass to the southeast is full of withered corpses. Using a ranged weapon allow you to start combat with some distance. Passing looting allows you to skip an encounter with desert wyrms and sand blights responsible for the deaths. <br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Ruined Tower.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Ruined Tower''': To the east beyond Broken Spear Pass, nets you a random collection of loot.<br clear="left" />

;Southwestern island
[[File:Icon Bridge.png|75px|left]]
:::'''[[Osa Channel]]''': Scripted interaction where you can choose to take part in a swimming race, or spectate and take bets.<br clear="left" />
[[File:Icon Village.png|75px|left]]
:::'''Fishing Village''': General trade goods, mainly fish.<br clear="left" />
title: Karatapu Channel
